tagline: Meditation, Bhajans & Mantras — all in one peaceful place.

about.short: SereneChant is a meditation app that brings together calming music, guided sessions, and a respectful collection of multi-faith bhajans and mantras.
about.long: SereneChant helps you build a daily habit of calm. Along with guided breathing and sleep meditations, the app offers a carefully curated, respectful library of devotional bhajans and mantras across traditions. Whether you seek focus, deep rest, or spiritual connection, SereneChant meets you with clarity, inclusiveness, and beautiful sound.

mission: Make mindfulness and devotional listening accessible, respectful, and ad-free friendly for everyone.
key_features: Guided meditations (focus, sleep, stress relief, breathwork)

content_guidelines.respectful_use: All devotional audio and texts are presented with attribution and cultural respect. We avoid remixing sacred content in inappropriate contexts.
content_guidelines.licensing: Only content with proper rights, public domain status, or creator permission is included.
content_guidelines.accuracy: Mantra texts are reviewed for accuracy in transliteration and meaning; variations may exist across lineages.
content_guidelines.user_reports: If something feels inaccurate or inappropriate, report it in-app; we’ll review promptly.

hi.short: SereneChant एक ऐसा मेडिटेशन ऐप है जिसमें शांति देने वाले गाने, गाइडेड सेशन्स और विभिन्न परंपराओं के भजन व मंत्र शामिल हैं।
hi.long: SereneChant आपको रोज़ाना शांति की आदत बनाने में मदद करता है। गाइडेड मेडिटेशन और स्लीप प्रैक्टिस के साथ, ऐप में विभिन्न परंपराओं के भजन-मंत्र का सम्मानपूर्ण संग्रह है। ध्यान, गहरी नींद या आध्यात्मिक जुड़ाव—जो भी आपका उद्देश्य हो—SereneChant उसे सरलता और आदर के साथ पूरा करता है।

data_practices.storage: Favourites and downloads saved locally on device.

disclaimer: SereneChant is for well-being and devotional listening. It is not a substitute for medical or mental-health care. If you have a medical condition, please consult a professional.
